title: Obey
description: Under the dangerous Maxim Koslov's spell, Frankie Marconi finds herself falling deeper and deeper into a world of violence and sin. But the rabbit hole of chaos can only go so far. When cruel reality threatens her cocoon of pain, can she rely on Maxim to help her withstand the onslaught?Or will she goad him into finally ending their twisted game...Once and for all.18+ Extremely Dark Themes. Strong Sexual/Adult content. Mentions of abuse and violence.
author: Lana Sky
